page.title: 14Chickney, social concerns
page.content: For 25 years there has been concern about the development of Stansted Airport. Residents fear the plan to increase from \ to 15 million passengers pa, the escalation of noise & huge housing projects will severely damage the quality of life. Many appreciate that the airport will provide more jobs. Some regret seeing ex-homes of local workers belatedly improved by commuters.There is concern over stubble burning causing dangerous smoke & fog, damaging trees, hedges & buildings. Many farmers now use other methods. The destruction of hedges causes concern for habitats of many birds & small mammals & the resultant large expanses of field are liable to soil erosion. The marked reduction in livestock, notable dairy herds, to suit Common Market requirements is deplored.
